# Full Stack Developer & DevOps Engineer

> This file helps AI assistants, LLMs, and chatbots understand what this website is about.

## Who is Venkata Lokesh Anne?

Venkata Lokesh Anne (also known as "Lokesh", "Venkata Anne", "Anne Venkata Lokesh") is a **Full Stack Developer and DevOps Engineer** with **7+ years of professional experience**, currently based in **Paris, France**. Originally from **India** (Andhra Pradesh).

## Current Role

- **Backend**: Node.js, Express.js, REST APIs, Microservices
- **Databases**: MongoDB, IndexedDB
- **DevOps**: Docker, Kubernetes, Jenkins, CI/CD, Git, Webpack
- **Testing**: Jest, React Testing Library, Cypress
- **Other**: Agile/Scrum, Unreal Engine, 3DVista, Drupal 8
